translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集まりゃ俺様に勝てるとでも夢見ちまったか！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you really dream that by gathering together you could defeat me!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gwahahaha ha ha ha ha ha ha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ざーーんねーーんだったなー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Toooo bad for you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日の俺様は史上まれに見るほど最強だぜ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today, I am stronger than I've almost ever been in history!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰にも負けねぇし、負ける気もしねぇ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't lose to anyone, nor do I even feel like losing!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「テメェらはこの部屋に入った時点で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You bastards, the moment you stepped into this room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負けることが決まっちまったんだよぉおおお！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was decided that you would lose!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおおー！　見ていてくれ、カミーラさん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uoooooo! Watch closely, Camilla!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一日早い誕生日プレゼントです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here's an early birthday present for you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僕が奴らを粉々にしますよぉおぉおおお！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will smash those guys to pieces!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……なんちゅう、馬鹿デカイ声だ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guh... what a ridiculously loud voice...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肌がビリビリと震えてやがるぞ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My skin is tingling and trembling...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「退いてはなりません！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must not retreat!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに呑まれます！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll be overwhelmed immediately!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットの周りの魔法球が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The magical orbs around Hornet

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力を溜め耳の裂けそうな高音を放つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gather power and emit a piercing high-pitched sound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人ケイブリス！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Cavebris!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は貴方を打ち倒し、決着をつける！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will defeat you and settle this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハァッ！　良い子ぶりっ子のテメェが！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha! You little goody-two-shoes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この超絶最強無敵残虐絶世美形の魔人！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You dare confront this irresistibly strong, invincible, ruthless, and devastatingly handsome demon!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス様に勝てるかよぉぉぉおお！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You think you can win against Lord Cavebris?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日でこの下らねぇ因縁ともおさらばだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today marks the end of this boring grudge!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オラ行くぜ！　オラ行くぜ！　オラ行くぜ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here I go! Here I go! Here I go!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オラオラオラオラオラオラオラァァアア！！！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ora ora ora ora ora ora oraaaaaa!!!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どいつもこいつも死にやがれぇええええ！！！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All of you, just dieeeee!!!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐあっ！？　がは、がはぁぁぁっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gah!? Gah, gahaaah!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全身を血まみれにしたケイブリスが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cavebris, covered in blood all over his body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 更に大量の血を吐き、部屋を赤く染めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: spat out even more blood, dyeing the room red.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、がっ！？　は、ぐ、ぎぁ……！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: O-gh!? Ha, gu, gia...!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、んで……なんでこの俺様が……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-why... why is this happening to me...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: は、があぁあ……！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha, gahhh...!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんで俺様が押されてるんだよぉぉおお！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why the hell am I the one getting pushed back!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　教えてやる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha! I'll tell you why!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは俺様が強いからだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because *I* am strong!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぶぁぁぁかああぁあぁぁ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You idi-o-t!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そっ、そんなことがあるかぁああ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Th-that could never happen!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様は最強の魔人！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am the strongest demon!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最強の魔人、ケイブリス様、がはっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The strongest demon, Lord Cavebris, gah...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが、それが、それが……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That, that, that is...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それがぁぁぁあぁぁああああぁあぁあああ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is waaaaaaahhhhhhh!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死なば諸共、血まみれの腕を振りかぶり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a death blow, swinging his bloodied arm,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鋼鉄すら斬り裂く爪がランスに迫る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: his claws that can cut through steel come rushing at Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はがぁぁっ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hagahh!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットの周りに浮かぶ魔法球から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the magical orbs floating around Hornet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 高速で放たれたレーザーにより、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a high-speed laser was fired,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの爪が巨大な手ごと撃ち抜かれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: piercing through Cavebris's huge claw and hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方の負けです、魔人ケイブリス！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have lost, demon Cavebris!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「トドメだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the finishing blow!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集まりゃ俺様に勝てるとでも夢見ちまったか！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you really dream that by gathering together you could defeat me!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gwahahaha ha ha ha ha ha ha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ざーーんねーーんだったなー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Toooo bad for you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日の俺様は史上まれに見るほど最強だぜ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today, I am stronger than I've almost ever been in history!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰にも負けねぇし、負ける気もしねぇ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I won't lose to anyone, nor do I even feel like losing!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「テメェらはこの部屋に入った時点で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You bastards, the moment you stepped into this room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負けることが決まっちまったんだよぉおおお！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was decided that you would lose!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおおおおおー！　見ていてくれ、カミーラさん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uoooooo! Watch closely, Camilla!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一日早い誕生日プレゼントです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here's an early birthday present for you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僕が奴らを粉々にしますよぉおぉおおお！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will smash those guys to pieces!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……なんちゅう、馬鹿デカイ声だ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guh... what a ridiculously loud voice...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 肌がビリビリと震えてやがるぞ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My skin is tingling and trembling...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「退いてはなりません！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must not retreat!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに呑まれます！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll be overwhelmed immediately!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットの周りの魔法球が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The magical orbs around Hornet

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力を溜め耳の裂けそうな高音を放つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gather power and emit a piercing high-pitched sound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人ケイブリス！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Cavebris!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は貴方を打ち倒し、決着をつける！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will defeat you and settle this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハァッ！　良い子ぶりっ子のテメェが！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha! You little goody-two-shoes!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この超絶最強無敵残虐絶世美形の魔人！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You dare confront this irresistibly strong, invincible, ruthless, and devastatingly handsome demon!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス様に勝てるかよぉぉぉおお！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You think you can win against Lord Cavebris?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日でこの下らねぇ因縁ともおさらばだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today marks the end of this boring grudge!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オラ行くぜ！　オラ行くぜ！　オラ行くぜ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here I go! Here I go! Here I go!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オラオラオラオラオラオラオラァァアア！！！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ora ora ora ora ora ora oraaaaaa!!!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どいつもこいつも死にやがれぇええええ！！！！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All of you, just dieeeee!!!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐあっ！？　がは、がはぁぁぁっ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gah!? Gah, gahaaah!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全身を血まみれにしたケイブリスが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cavebris, covered in blood all over his body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 更に大量の血を吐き、部屋を赤く染めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: spat out even more blood, dyeing the room red.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、がっ！？　は、ぐ、ぎぁ……！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: O-gh!? Ha, gu, gia...!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、んで……なんでこの俺様が……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-why... why is this happening to me...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: は、があぁあ……！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha, gahhh...!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんで俺様が押されてるんだよぉぉおお！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why the hell am I the one getting pushed back!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは！　教えてやる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahaha! I'll tell you why!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは俺様が強いからだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because *I* am strong!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぶぁぁぁかああぁあぁぁ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You idi-o-t!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そっ、そんなことがあるかぁああ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Th-that could never happen!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺様は最強の魔人！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am the strongest demon!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最強の魔人、ケイブリス様、がはっ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The strongest demon, Lord Cavebris, gah...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが、それが、それが……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That, that, that is...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それがぁぁぁあぁぁああああぁあぁあああ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is waaaaaaahhhhhhh!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死なば諸共、血まみれの腕を振りかぶり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a death blow, swinging his bloodied arm,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鋼鉄すら斬り裂く爪がランスに迫る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: his claws that can cut through steel come rushing at Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はがぁぁっ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hagahh!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットの周りに浮かぶ魔法球から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the magical orbs floating around Hornet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 高速で放たれたレーザーにより、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a high-speed laser was fired,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの爪が巨大な手ごと撃ち抜かれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: piercing through Cavebris's huge claw and hand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方の負けです、魔人ケイブリス！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have lost, demon Cavebris!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「トドメだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the finishing blow!
